name: Doomed Heaven and Hell
description:
Ever wonder if angels are as benevolent as you were led to believe? Well wonder no more, come find out in this game that they will mess you up if they get the chance.

This was inspired by shooters of old - has stuff to find and monsters to kill.

Game created for : 2022 Epic MegaJam

Controls:

Escape - Pause

Q - Warp

R - Reload

W/A/S/D - Move

Spacebar - Dash

1/2/3/4 - Select weapon

Mouse - Look around

Left Mouse Button - Fire

Right Mouse Button - Alt fire
